Oh yeah. I've known how to change a diaper, make a baby's bottle, and burp a baby since I was eight years old. I'm very good at childcare and all the kids I've babysit ADORE me. But when tryIng to get hired by a day-care center, "you're a man so we can't hire you."
*FFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUCK YYYYYYOOOOOOOOUUUUUUUUUUUUU.*
